body.p: IAS 10 required the amount of a contingent loss to be recognised as an expense and a liability if:

li.p: it was probable that future events will confirm that, after taking into account any related probable recovery, an asset had been impaired or a liability incurred at the balance sheet date; and
a reasonable estimate of the amount of the resulting loss could be made.
